355200465.activityDescription: Travel deep into the heart of the Dreadnaught in pursuit of a Cabal assault team. Stop it from detonating the Hive ship's core.

skulls.description: Heavily shielded and highly aggressive enemies appear in great numbers.
Arc Damage from any source is greatly increased.
Solar damage from any source is greatly increased.
Void damage from any source is greatly increased.
Minions of the Darkness won't flinch, even after massive damage.
Guardian melee damage is greatly increased.
Minions of the Darkness deal much more melee damage.
Special Weapon damage is favored.
Primary Weapon damage is favored.
No ammo drops for your equipped weapon.
Players take more damage while airborne.
Enemies fire more frequently and more accurately.
Player radar is disabled.
Some enemy squads have been fortified with additional reinforcements.
More enemies have shields.
Enemy shields are resistant to all unmatched Elemental Damage.
Players deal more damage while in the air.
Grenade recharge rate is greatly increased.
Guardian shields are increased but do not replenish.
Recharge of abilities is significantly reduced.

2326253031.activityDescription: Skolas and his crew challenge the Guardians who captured him. Face him with a Fireteam of three. End him.

2604992012.activityDescription: Return to the Chamber of Night and steal a shard of the crystal that once held Crota's soul.

skulls.description: Enemies appear in greater numbers and are more aggressive.

3102295231.activityDescription:
"Treasures and forgotten tech lie waiting in the wake of the Golden Age's collapse. One must be swift and fierce to claim them." Lord Shaxx 

Race the other team to capture and hold relics.

3508129769.activityDescription: Gulrot, Unclean has been summoned by the Worm Keepers. Don't let the beast's filth spread beyond the prison.

4079642014.activityDescription: Valus Trau'ug seeks to prove his might by crushing all who challenge him.

2512542997.destinationDescription: Join a fireteam of three and face the most feared minions of the Darkness.

2777041980.destinationDescription: Hone your skills and win glory in battle against other Guardians.

2897855902.destinationDescription: Oryx's Dreadnaught is far more than just a ship.

3393905939.destinationDescription: Dare to strike a bargain with the ruthless Queen.

4233735899.destinationDescription: An ancient evil stirs beneath the shattered surface of our Moon.

596872852.placeDescription: The ringed wonder hosts dozens of moons.

3128647858.placeDescription: An ancient evil stirs beneath the surface of our Moon.

3747705955.placeDescription: Mankind's cradle, full of shattered glory, ready to be reclaimed.

4088006058.placeDescription: Hone your skills and win glory in battle against other Guardians.

575572995.activityTypeDescription: Join a fireteam of three and face the most feared minions of the Darkness.

1686739444.activityTypeDescription: Embark on adventures alone or with a fireteam to push back the Darkness and reclaim our lost worlds.

2127351241.activityTypeDescription: Face your fellow Guardians in open combat. Prove your worth, and you will be rewarded.

2889152536.activityTypeDescription: Join a fireteam of three and face the most feared minions of the Darkness.

3323301749.activityTypeDescription: Face your fellow Guardians in open combat. Prove your worth, and you will be rewarded.

50307240.itemDescription: Hkke prototype. Make double-kills with this weapon to gather data for Hkke's armament scientists.

133098253.itemDescription: Hkke prototype. Make precision shots with this weapon to gather data for Hkke's armament scientists.

250113089.itemDescription: Warlocks devised the Series-20 Seeker variant of the Sparrow for their own arcane purposes.

250113091.itemDescription: The Series-22 Seeker answers the esoteric needs of elite Warlocks.

1001251654.itemDescription: These boots left their mark on victory lane.

1068518405.itemDescription: Base model "near-star" jumpship. The Regulus was originally built for speed and maneuverability, but the basic class models rely on limited resources and rarely reach full spec.

1068518406.itemDescription: Base model experimental jumpship. The Kestrel is thought to have been a prototype long-range craft designed near the end of the Golden Age. Most in service are rebuilt using reverse-engineered specs.

1266297712.itemDescription: Worn by champions of the track.

1501850184.itemDescription: Suros prototype. Use against Vex targets to gather field data for the Suros research department.

1808632556.itemDescription: The Series-22 Nomad helps Hunters stalk swift prey.

1808632558.itemDescription: Hunters have a reputation for technical savvy. The S-20 Nomad highlights that expertise.

1904384474.itemDescription: You've proven yourself worthy. Bring this to Variks in the Reef to redeem for a piece of armor.

2098148065.itemDescription: Hkke prototype. Use against Cabal Centurions to gather data for Hkke's armament scientists.

2129417488.itemDescription:
Open a toolkit to reveal its contents.

Contains: 
Random Legendary SRL Armor x1
Highly likely to contain a piece of gear not currently owned.

2170625070.itemDescription: Don't outthink your opponents. Outfly them.

2534352370.itemDescription: A currency used to purchase Legendary gear from vendors in the Tower.
2534352370.displaySource: Obtained from Daily Heroic and Daily Crucible playlists, as well as dismantling Legendary gear.

2759745988.itemDescription:
Defeat enemies in the Prison of Elders to gain notoriety with the House of Judgment.

Raise your standing to unlock better rewards.

2828837278.itemDescription: Scratches and scars are marks of victory.

2962471954.itemDescription: Suros prototype. Make precision kills to gather data for the Suros research department.

2990972208.itemDescription: Your power grows. Bring this to Variks in the Reef to redeem for a weapon.

3109888176.itemDescription: A volatile synthesis of energized matter and self-modifying energy constructs.
3109888176.displaySource: Obtained from Nightfall Strikes, the Prison of Elders and awarded for renowned performance in the Trials of Osiris.

3159615086.itemDescription: The currency of the City. A programmable matter used as a source of power before the Collapse. Glimmer is shared between all your characters.

3665240234.itemDescription: The Series-20 Cavalier is a Titan mainstay, more robust and reliable than the baseline Sparrow.

3665240235.itemDescription: Titans tune their thrust bikes to handle the burden of heavy armor.

3856095524.itemName: SRL: Go Big or Go Home
3856095524.displaySource: "You done all that? Better give ya something for effort." Amanda Holliday

4141295011.itemDescription: Base model long range jumpship. Phaetons are sturdy and reliable, though the basic class models are rebuilt below spec, due to limited supplies and high demand.

4141295018.itemDescription: Base model long range jumpship. Ships capable of interplanetary travel are in limited supply. Most are never rebuilt to anything resembling their Golden Age glory.

4141295021.itemDescription: Base model experimental jumpship. Ships capable of interplanetary travel are in limited supply. Most are never rebuilt to anything resembling their Golden Age glory.

4254137628.itemDescription: The LRv1 Javelin is a standard Phaeton-class long range jumpship. Refurbished and rigged for dangerous flight.

4275602357.itemDescription: Complete an SRL lap on Mars in fewer than two minutes.
4275602357.displaySource: "Those fan blades have taken out more Guardians than the Fallen." Marcus Ren

4275602358.itemDescription: Hit gates in a single race during any SRL race.
4275602358.displaySource: "That was a sight to see! Amazing!" Amanda Holliday

4275602367.itemDescription: Complete tricks in SRL races. Tricks are emotes, rolls and flips.
4275602367.displaySource: "You might be good, but try doing that when your Sparrow's on fire." Marcus Ren

1498876634.bucketDescription: Auto rifles, pulse rifles, scout rifles, and hand cannons.

2197472680.bucketDescription: Additional missions for Guardians to carry out in the wilderness.

2465295065.bucketDescription: Shotguns, fusion rifles, and sniper rifles.

2689798304.bucketDescription: A currency used to purchase Legendary gear from vendors in the Tower.

2689798308.bucketDescription: The currency of the City. A programmable matter used as a source of power before the Collapse. Glimmer is shared between all your characters.

3865314626.bucketDescription: Useful for equipment upgrades and more.

144602215.statDescription:
Decreases the cooldown of your super ability.

Intellect can be increased by your Armor.

155624089.statDescription: Decreases weapon recoil when fired continuously.

360359141.statDescription: Higher Durability allows your vehicle to take more damage before failing.

368428387.statDescription: Higher Attack allows your weapons to damage higher-level opponents.

943549884.statDescription: The speed with which the weapon can be readied and aimed.

1240592695.statDescription: Increases the effective range of this weapon.

1345609583.statDescription: The weapon's ability to augment your aim.

1501155019.statDescription: How fast this vehicle travels over land.

1735777505.statDescription:
Discipline decreases the cooldown time of your grenades, allowing you to use them more often.

Find and equip armor with Discipline to boost this effect.

1931675084.statDescription: How much space the weapon occupies in the inventory.

2391494160.statDescription: Light increases your level, increasing the damage your abilities deal against higher-level enemies.

2715839340.statDescription: The weapon's tendency to move while firing.

3017642079.statDescription: How much speed can be gained from boosting.

3871231066.statDescription: The number of shots which can be fired before reloading.

3897883278.statDescription: Reduces incoming damage from your enemies.

4043523819.statDescription: Increases the damage inflicted by each round.

4188031367.statDescription: Decreases the time it takes to reload this weapon.

4244567218.statDescription:
Strength reduces the cooldown time of your melee ability, allowing you to use it more often.

Find and equip armor with Strength to boost this effect.

4284893193.statDescription: The number of shots per minute this weapon can fire.

77746637.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon grant enhanced motion tracker resolution for a short time.

192233393.displayDescription: Increases the reload speed of this weapon when its mag is empty.

318657130.displayDescription: This weapon gains increased reload and handling when two or more enemies are in close proximity.

448609668.displayDescription: Replenish health when you pick up an Orb.

525257484.displayDescription: Reduced cooldown after the Sparrow is destroyed.

597127202.displayDescription: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range.

653222695.displayDescription: Use  to pitch the Sparrow forward or back while in the air. Pitch forward to fall faster, pitch back to fall slower.

707792617.displayDescription: Gain bonus Super energy from melee kills on minions of the Darkness.

731752060.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon increase reload speed for a short time.

1101818187.displayDescription: Bonus grenade energy on Orb pickup.

1405953642.displayDescription: Reduces time needed to summon Sparrow.

1846145321.displayDescription: Gain bonus Super energy from reviving others.

1863078623.displayDescription: Causing damage with this weapon increases its stability.

1900693659.displayDescription: Quick unassisted kills with this weapon reduce grenade and melee cooldown.

2131801999.displayDescription: Shields start recovery immediately after Orb pickup.

2421244048.displayDescription: Readying this weapon grants a brief period of bonus accuracy.

2450150110.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon grant bonus damage for a short time.

2525259694.displayDescription: Optical zoom length is increased while crouched.

2626112550.displayDescription: It's easier to aim under fire using this weapon.

2664229771.displayDescription: Gain bonus Super energy from Special Weapon kills on minions of the Darkness.

2725595956.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon grant a brief boost to the sprint's top speed.

2818471317.displayDescription: The amount of fuel you gain from performing tricks is increased.

3031234337.displayDescription: Increased accuracy, handling and damage resistance when shooting this weapon from behind cover.

3119194123.displayDescription: The bottom half of each magazine causes additional damage.

3245550306.displayDescription: This weapon can be fired in full auto mode.

3302053862.displayDescription: Gain bonus Super energy from Heavy Weapon kills on minions of the Darkness.

3317503477.displayDescription: Expect to find more ammo for this weapon.

3464328064.displayDescription: This weapon gains bonus damage when three or more enemies are in close proximity.

3523239750.displayDescription: This weapon handles and reloads faster when the wielder is the last living player of their Fireteam.

3632688592.displayDescription: Hold  to accelerate to higher speed.

3686406336.displayDescription: A kill with the final round in the magazine increases reload speed.

3743041729.displayDescription: Gain bonus melee energy on Orb pickups.

3752206822.displayDescription: The last round in a magazine deals bonus damage.

3792198727.displayDescription: Gain bonus Super energy on Grenade kills.

3848963378.displayDescription: Chance to return a portion of the magazine after an assist.

3877389831.displayDescription: Reduces the severity of this weapons recoil.

4023922623.displayDescription: Rapidly landing precision hits will return one round to the magazine.

4189070124.displayDescription: Use  to brake and corner more aggressively.

4198986151.displayDescription: Precision kills with this weapon dramatically increase reload speed.

6.title: Guardians, start your Sparrows!
6.subtitle: SRL is coming with new Sparrow racing quests and bounties. Hit the track and collect new SRL-themed rewards.

2063852581.activityDescription:
"Enjoy yourselves, Guardians." Lord Shaxx

Embrace the chaos. Greatly increased ability recharge rates. Faster Special and Heavy Ammo spawns. No respawn delay. Scoring values multiplied by 10.

3102295231.activityDescription:
"Treasures and forgotten tech lie waiting in the wake of the Golden Age's collapse. One must be swift and fierce to claim them." Lord Shaxx 

Race the other team to capture and hold relics.
